Description:
INCTALH11032022/1
You have failed to ensure that your employees in the workshop are not being exposed to substances hazardous to health, namely metal working fluids, because their exposure is not prevented or adequately controlled and there is a reasonable likelihood of workers developing serious ill health such as work related respiratory and skin disorders.
INCTALH11032022/2
You have failed to make a suitable and sufficient assessment of the risks to employees arising from the use, storage and movement of dangerous substances in the workplace. E.g: Methyl ethyl ketone.
